info.name: Hummii API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Hummii platform - Service Marketplace for Canada

Includes:
- Authentication endpoints (register, login, refresh, logout)
- User management (profile, update, delete, export)
- Session management
- Password reset flow
- PIPEDA compliance endpoints
- Orders, Proposals, Contractors, Categories
- Reviews, Chat, Notifications
- Subscriptions, Disputes, Verification
- SEO, Analytics, Sitemap
- Admin endpoints
- Webhooks, Metrics, Health checks

item.name: Authentication

exec: // New refresh token should be different (token rotation)

request.description: Refresh access token using refresh token. Token rotation is implemented.
Test error handling for invalid refresh token
Logout current session. Invalidates the refresh token.
Logout all active sessions for the current user. Requires authentication.

exec: // Note: Always returns 200 for security (doesn't reveal if email exists)

request.description: Request password reset. Always returns 200 for security (doesn't reveal if email exists).
Confirm password reset with token. Token can be obtained from database or email.
Get all active sessions for the current user. Requires authentication.
Delete specific session. Requires authentication. Session ID can be obtained from Get Active Sessions.
Initiate Google OAuth flow. This redirects to Google authentication page.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, token management, and OAuth

item.name: Users

request.description: Get current authenticated user profile. PIPEDA: Right to Access. Requires authentication.
Test unauthorized access to protected route
Update current user profile. PIPEDA: Right to Rectification. All fields are optional.
Export all user data in JSON format. PIPEDA: Right to Data Portability. Requires authentication.
Delete user account (soft delete). PIPEDA: Right to Erasure. After deletion, token becomes invalid.

item.description: User management endpoints including profile operations and PIPEDA compliance endpoints

request.description: Test password validation - password must be at least 12 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and number
Test error handling for invalid JWT token

exec: // This test sends multiple requests quickly
// Rate limiting should kick in after 5 requests

request.description: Test rate limiting. Send this request multiple times quickly (10+ times) to trigger rate limit (429).

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Fix plumbing issue",
  "description": "Need a plumber to fix leaky faucet",
  "categoryId": "category-id",
  "budget": 200,
  "location": {
    "address": "123 Main St",
    "city": "Toronto",
    "province": "ON",
    "postalCode": "M1A 1A1",
    "latitude": 43.6532,
    "longitude": -79.3832
  }
}

request.description: Create a new order. Requires authentication.

Get all subscriptions with filtering (admin only)
Send bulk notifications (admin only, max 1000 users)
Get Prometheus metrics in text format
